languages.text: "Без драки скучно. Я поохочусь на нижних палубах твоего корабля".
"Things are dull when there is no fight to be had. I think I shall go hunting on the lower decks of your ship for a while."
languages.original_text: "Без драки скучно. Я поохочусь на нижних палубах твоего корабля".

traits.locale_text: "Things are dull when there is no fight to be had. I think I will go hunt on the lower decks of your ship for a while."
"Things are dull when there is no fight to be had. I think I will go hunt on the lower decks of your ship for a while."
"Things are dull when there is no fight to be had. I think I shall go hunting on the lower decks of your ship for a while."
"Things are dull when there is no fight to be had. I think I shall go hunting on the lower decks of your ship for a while."
"Things are dull when there is no fight to be had. I think I shall go hunting on the lower decks of your ship for a while."

languages.text: “找不到人打架的日子实在是太无聊了，我得去底层甲板来场狩猎。”
languages.original_text: "Things are dull when there is no fight to be had. I think I shall go hunting on the lower decks of your ship for a while."

traits.locale_text: “找不到人打架的日子实在是太无聊了，我得去底层甲板来场狩猎。”

languages.text: 「戦いがないなんてつまらねえな。下層デッキにでも行って獲物でも探してくるか」
languages.original_text: "Things are dull when there is no fight to be had. I think I shall go hunting on the lower decks of your ship for a while."

traits.locale_text: 「戦いがないなんてつまらねえな。下層デッキにでも行って獲物でも探してくるか」

languages.text: « La vie est terne quand il n'y a aucun combat à mener. Je crois que je vais aller chasser sur les ponts inférieurs de votre vaisseau pendant quelque temps. »
languages.original_text: "Things are dull when there is no fight to be had. I think I shall go hunting on the lower decks of your ship for a while."

traits.locale_text: « La vie est terne quand il n'y a aucun combat à mener. Je crois que je vais aller chasser sur les ponts inférieurs de votre vaisseau pendant quelque temps. »

languages.text: «Cuando no estoy peleando, todo es tan aburrido... Creo que debería ir a cazar a las cubiertas inferiores de su nave».
languages.original_text: "Things are dull when there is no fight to be had. I think I shall go hunting on the lower decks of your ship for a while."

traits.locale_text: «Cuando no estoy peleando, todo es tan aburrido... Creo que debería ir a cazar a las cubiertas inferiores de su nave».

languages.text: "Ohne einen Kampf ist das Leben langweilig. Ich denke, ich werde eine Weile auf den unteren Decks Eures Schiffes auf die Jagd gehen."
languages.original_text: "Things are dull when there is no fight to be had. I think I shall go hunting on the lower decks of your ship for a while."

traits.locale_text: "Ohne einen Kampf ist das Leben langweilig. Ich denke, ich werde eine Weile auf den unteren Decks Eures Schiffes auf die Jagd gehen."

languages.text: "Savaşılacak bir savaş olmadığı zaman her şey tekdüzeleşiyor. Sanırım bir süreliğine geminin alt güvertelerinde avlanmaya çıkacağım."
languages.original_text: "Things are dull when there is no fight to be had. I think I shall go hunting on the lower decks of your ship for a while."
